sentences.en: Her scene ended up on the cutting room floor.
sentences.cn: 她的镜头最后被剪掉了。

sentences.en: His tax-cutting pledge brought a delirious crowd to their feet.
sentences.cn: 他减税的承诺让亢奋的人群欢呼雀跃起来。

sentences.en: I could see long canoes cutting through the waves.
sentences.cn: 我看见长长的独木舟破浪而行。

sentences.en: If I drop a few hints he might give me a cutting.
sentences.cn: 如果我给点暗示，他没准会送我一段插枝。

sentences.en: Jordan promised to trim the city budget without cutting essential services.
sentences.cn: 乔丹承诺在不减少基本服务的前提下，缩减市政预算。

sentences.en: Margot sent him some press cuttings about the wedding.
sentences.cn: 玛戈给他寄了一些有关这场婚礼的剪报。

sentences.en: Mr. Long was now cutting himself a piece of the pink cake.
sentences.cn: 朗先生正在给自己切一块粉色蛋糕。

sentences.en: People make cutting remarks to help themselves feel superior or powerful.
sentences.cn: 人们说话尖酸刻薄是为了使自己感觉高高在上或是有权有势。

sentences.en: Take cuttings from it in July or August.
sentences.cn: 在7月或8月从它上面剪下插枝。

sentences.en: Television censors are cutting out scenes which they claim may offend.
sentences.cn: 电视节目审查官正在剪掉他们称有可能会令人反感的一些镜头。

sentences.en: The big factories are trying to stay alive by cutting costs.
sentences.cn: 大型工厂正试图通过削减成本以维持生存。

sentences.en: The knife for cutting sausage was sitting in the sink.
sentences.cn: 切香肠用的刀放在水槽里。

sentences.en: The new measures are aimed at cutting back on intrusive telephone solicitations.
sentences.cn: 新措施旨在减少不请自来的电话调查。

sentences.en: The Superpowers turned to the harder task of cutting their nuclear arsenals.
sentences.cn: 超级大国开始着手削减核武器库这项更为艰难的工作。

sentences.en: They were crossing from lane to lane, cutting everyone up.
sentences.cn: 他们不停地转换车道，强行超过了所有的车。

sentences.en: This shipyard is at the cutting edge of world shipbuilding technology.
sentences.cn: 该造船厂的造船技术处于世界最前沿。

sentences.en: What we are planning is cutting-edge technology never seen in Australia before.
sentences.cn: 我们正在开发的是一种在澳大利亚从未有过的尖端技术。

words.tran_cn: 削减（cut的ing形式）；[林]采伐；切开

phrases.tran_cn: 切削深度，切削厚度；掏槽深度；切项度；开挖深度
刀头；刻纹头；机械录音头
[建]切削机，切割机；裁切机，裁剪机；截煤机；下料压力机
电火花线切割；钢丝切坯

trans.tran_cn: 锋利的，锐利的，刺骨的，像刀割似的，讽刺的，挖苦的
切割，剪报，剪辑，[园]插枝，开凿
trans.tran_en: an article that has been cut from a newspaper or magazine

trans.tran_cn: 切开(cut的现在分词)，削减，采伐
